history.content:
Hello,

I took 16A a couple of semesters ago, but unfortunately dropped right before finals. In hindsight, I should’ve filed for an incomplete. I was really hoping that it would be offered this summer but I wasn’t proactive enough to schedule it in earlier. I am a senior with EGT of Fall 2021. 

My question is: can I appeal for some kind of retroactive incomplete if I have proof that I took the class up until the final? I really don’t want to spend an extra semester just for taking 16A, but I understand. This was a big mistake on my part. I spoke to an L&S CS advisor and she said that there aren’t any options for me. I’ve taken math 54, so 54 + 16A(or B) fulfills my requirement (I’m pre 2017). I’m also DSP, if that changes anything. 
I also used my emergency drop for 16A. 

Please let me know how bad the situation is. It’s the only class left that I need to graduate.
history.subject: EECS 16A Appeal
